医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
试验显示，Solriamfetol 可能是治疗成人多动症的有效替代品尽管有几种药物被批准用于治疗注意力缺陷/多动障碍 (ADHD)，但有些人从这些药物中获得的益处有限，或者会因使用而产生副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Solriamfetol-may-be-an- effective-alternative-for-managing-ADHD-in-adults-Trial-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Solriamfetol-may-be-an- effective-alternative-for-managing-ADHD-in-adults-Trial-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac11ae31-e07c-4f65-b07b-3af7954a61a4 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 13:19:53 -0400 Solriamfetol may be an effective alternative for managing ADHD in adults, trial shows
健康专家重新定义心血管疾病的风险、预防和管理根据美国心脏协会今天在该协会旗舰期刊《循环》上发布的新主席建议，健康专家正在重新定义心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险、预防和管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Health-experts-redefine-cardioangio-disease-risk-prevention-and-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Health-experts-redefine-cardioangio-disease-risk-prevention-and-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d41024d1-74b8-476b-bf56-4778ade98ab9 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 13:11:39 -0400 Health experts redefine cardiovascular disease risk, prevention and management
肺癌筛查资格新模型比当前 USPSTF 方法更准确一项新研究发现，识别符合筛查条件的肺癌患者的替代模型比目前使用的基于美国预防服务工作组 (USPSTF) 标准的方法更准确。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/New-model-for-lung-cancer-screening-eligibility-more-accurate-than-current-USPSTF-method.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/New-model-for-lung-cancer-screening-eligibility-more-accurate-than-current-USPSTF-method.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83fc1fc3-3b31-4b25-8a46-f83b8c1c55ae Mon, 09 Oct 2023 13:04:00 -0400 New model for lung cancer screening eligibility more accurate than current USPSTF method
研究发现未接种疫苗的 COVID-19 幸存者更容易出现心脏并发症新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU Singapore）及其附属教师领导的一项全国性研究发现，从 COVID-19 中康复的未接种疫苗的人在近一年后患心脏并发症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Heart-complications-more-likely-in-unvaccinated-COVID-19-survivors-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Heart-complications-more-likely-in-unvaccinated-COVID-19-survivors-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fc2afde-da35-44c5-b6e6-ad5aca02851a Mon, 09 Oct 2023 12:42:11 -0400 Heart complications more likely in unvaccinated COVID-19 survivors, study finds
充满爱的亲子关系可以促进亲社会性和心理健康研究表明，父母与孩子之间的早期爱的纽带会显着增加孩子“亲社会”的倾向，并对他人表现出友善和同理心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Loving-parent-child-relationships-boost-prosociality-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Loving-parent-child-relationships-boost-prosociality-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f0eaf62-21fe-45df-bd69-e09a993336d4 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 12:33:30 -0400 Loving parent-child relationships boost prosociality and mental health
母亲的情绪训练可能会改善与婴儿的关系多达三分之一的母亲在婴儿出生后与婴儿的关系不好，给母亲和婴儿带来强烈的情绪困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Emotional-training-for-mothers-may-lead-to-better-bonding-with-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Emotional-training-for-mothers-may-lead-to-better-bonding-with-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7cda29b-c3c4-47a4-ac92-4c76ea0f2afa Mon, 09 Oct 2023 12:26:02 -0400 Emotional training for mothers may lead to better bonding with babies
研究揭示心理负担如何加剧患有皮肤病的身体影响一项主要的泛欧洲研究表明，几乎所有受皮肤病影响的患者都面临着尴尬，心理负担加剧了与疾病一起生活对身体的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Study-reveals-how-psychological-burden-compounds-the-physical-impact-of-living-with-skin-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Study-reveals-how-psychological-burden-compounds-the-physical-impact-of-living-with-skin-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c478743e-3061-40de-92f0-5f4e6b1e3992 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 12:18:39 -0400 Study reveals how psychological burden compounds the physical impact of living with skin disease
研究解释了抗抑郁药治疗作用延迟的原因SSRI 抗抑郁药通常需要几周时间才能显示出对心理健康的益处，但为什么需要这么长时间呢？现在，一组临床医生和科学家的研究提供了第一个人类证据，证明这是由于大脑的物理变化导致在摄入 SSRI 的最初几周内大脑可塑性增强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Research-explains-the-reason-behind-delay-in-therapeutic-action-of-antidepressants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Research-explains-the-reason-behind-delay-in-therapeutic-action-of-antidepressants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca782533-6f2b-48ae-bd1c-22596e95b43d Mon, 09 Oct 2023 12:10:11 -0400 Research explains the reason behind delay in therapeutic action of antidepressants
研究比较了抗抑郁药与跑步运动对抑郁症和整体健康的影响第一项比较抗抑郁药与跑步运动对焦虑、抑郁和整体健康的影响的研究表明，它们对心理健康的益处大致相同，但同期 16 周的跑步课程在身体健康改善方面得分更高，而正如之前的研究表明的那样，抗抑郁药会导致身体状况稍微恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Study-compares-effects-of-antidepressants-with-running-exercises-for-depression-and-overall-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Study-compares-effects-of-antidepressants-with-running-exercises-for-depression-and-overall-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22802e9e-0b59-4e74-a88b-f39ee8536a6b Mon, 09 Oct 2023 12:05:11 -0400 Study compares effects of antidepressants with running exercises for depression and overall health
休斯敦大学的 SUSTAIN 中心在美国南部抗击艾滋病毒流行方面产生了持久影响过去五年，休斯敦大学社会工作研究生院的 SUSTAIN Wellbeing COMPASS 协调中心在美国南部抗击艾滋病毒流行的斗争中产生了持久的影响，特别是对黑人和拉丁裔领导的组织而言。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/UHs-SUSTAIN-Center-makes- permanent-impact-in-fight-against-HIV-epidemic-in-Southern-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/UHs-SUSTAIN-Center-makes- permanent-impact-in-fight-against-HIV-epidemic-in-Southern-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=918c8a8c-2a1b-4366-a9cb-01ddf2a78c7e Mon, 09 Oct 2023 11:59:00 -0400 UH's SUSTAIN Center makes lasting impact in the fight against HIV epidemic in Southern U.S.
